00031 /*! Bitstream handler state */
00032 struct bitstream_state_s
00033 {
00034     /*! The bit stream. */
00035     uint32_t bitstream;
00036     /*! The residual bits in bitstream. */
00037     int residue;
00038     /*! TRUE if the stream is LSB first, else MSB first */
00039     int lsb_first;
00040 };
